label: Faith
description: You're dedicated to an unseen power, forgotten god, ancestor, etc.

label: Gambling
description: You crave games of chance, betting on sporting events, etc.

label: Luxury
description: Expensive and/or ostentatious displays of opulence.

label: Obligation
description: You're devoted to a family, a cause, a charity, etc.

label: Pleasure
description: Gratification from lovers, food, drink, drugs, art, theater, etc.

label: Stupor
description: You seek oblivion in the abuse of drugs, drink to excess, getting beaten to a pulp in the fighting pits, etc.

label: Weird
description: You experiment with strange essences, consort with rogue spirits, observe bizarre rituals or taboos, etc.
